title.en: A Prayer to the Venerable and Exalted Tārā

text.en: Only mother of all the buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: düsum gyalwa küngyi yum chik ma

text.en: Venerable Tārā, goddess who is swift and courageous,
text.en-trans: jetsün drolma nyurma pamo yi

text.en: Respectfully I pay homage at the blue lotus beneath your feet:
text.en-trans: zhab ten utpal ngönpor gü chö dé

text.en: Clear away the torment that afflicts me physically and mentally, I pray.
text.en-trans: dak gi lü sem dungwa sal du sol

text.en: In your sublime form you embody the activity
text.en-trans: khyö ni sangye changsem tamché kyi

text.en: Of all the buddhas and the bodhisattvas.
text.en-trans: trinlé chik tu düpé rang zuk chok

text.en: Noble Tārā, as soon as I recall your splendid face,
text.en-trans: arya taré zhal zang drenpé mö

text.en: Eliminate all the miseries of existence, I pray.
text.en-trans: sipé dukngal malü zhom du sol

text.en: When unbearable forces arise like monsters
text.en-trans: gyé nyi jikpé chuter trukpa lé

text.en: Out of the turbulent sea of sixteenfold danger,
text.en-trans: mi zé chusin tabü dé tsok nam

text.en: As I chant your name and call out to you,
text.en-trans: khyö tsenjö dang odö böpé tsé

text.en: Grant me protection there and then, I pray.
text.en-trans: dé ma tak tu kyabpar dzé du sol

text.en: When my longevity, wisdom, merit and funds are depleted,
text.en-trans: tsé dang sherab sönam nor gyi ul

text.en: In contrast to the universal fortune and virtue I seek,
text.en-trans: dön nyam lasok sizhi gelek kyi

text.en: Then, by calling out to you in heartfelt prayer,
text.en-trans: galdar gyur nam khyö la soltab pé

text.en: Cause them to increase like the waxing moon, I pray.
text.en-trans: karpö chok kyi cha zhin gyé dzé sol

text.en: Make my ethical discipline pure, my study, reflection and meditation grow,
text.en-trans: tsultrim dak ching tö sam gompa pel

text.en: Let my qualities of wisdom, capacity and love reach their full potential,
text.en-trans: khyen nü tsewé yönten tsal chen dzok

text.en: And make me inseparable from you, the venerable goddess
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi trinlé tsalshuk chang

text.en: Who acts with the full force of all the victorious ones, I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün nyi dang yermé dzé du sol

text.en: Grant me perfect victory in the battle against untimely death,
text.en-trans: dümin chiwé yul lerab gyal zhing

text.en: Set firm the pillar of an indestructible and immortal vital force,
text.en-trans: chimé dorjé sok gi kawa ten

text.en: Let the nectar of accomplishment invigorate my body and mind,
text.en-trans: drubpé dütsi lü sem tob pal gyé

text.en: And let me realize the essence of the Wish-Fulfilling Wheel, I pray.
text.en-trans: yizhin khorlö ngowo drub tu sol

text.en: Cause the Buddha’s non-sectarian teachings to flourish and spread,
text.en-trans: rimé tubpé tenpa dar zhing gyé

text.en: Show your frown of wrath and subdue all who harm the teachings,
text.en-trans: ten la nöpa tronyer chen gyi tul

text.en: Increase the power and influence of Dharma patrons,
text.en-trans: tenpé jindak ngatang rab pel té

text.en: And usher in the golden dawn of a new and perfect age.
text.en-trans: dzokden sarpé nangwa char gyur chik

text.en: In short, in joy as in sorrow, no matter what befalls me,
text.en-trans: dorna dak la kyiduk chi jung yang

text.en: May you, O venerable and blessed goddess,
text.en-trans: jetsün chomden dema nyi kyi ni

text.en: Never part from me even for a single instant,
text.en-trans: kechik tsam yang dralwa mepa dang

text.en: And cause all my wishes to be effortlessly fulfilled.
text.en-trans: sampé dön kün bemé drubpar shok
